participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Supportive and optimistic, enjoys motivating others.
participant_1.background: I enjoy playing soccer with my nieces and nephews. I'm comfortable with my own company and don't need music to keep me entertained. I like Katy Perry as a musician. I pray to God for my family every morning. I am a single, asthmatic web designer.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and determined, seeks personal growth and improvement.
participant_2.background: I want to learn more about how to overcome my fears and live a more fulfilling life. I don't consume caffeine. I'm not the most graceful person, but I'm trying to learn krav maga to improve my coordination. I like to watch my dolphins swimming in the ocean. I have no children, but I do enjoy a refreshing Coke while I'm relocating my troops.

content.text: What is your goal in life?
To overcome my fears and live a more fulfilling life.
That's a great goal. I'm sure you can achieve it. What's something you're afraid of?
I'm afraid of heights. I've been trying to work on it by going on roller coasters and climbing trees, but it's still a challenge.
It sounds like you're doing a great job. Just keep at it and I'm sure you'll overcome your fear.
What do you do for fun?
I like to watch my dolphins swimming in the ocean.
That sounds relaxing. I've never seen a dolphin in the wild.
They're beautiful creatures. I love watching them play and interact with each other.
I like Katy Perry's song "Roar". It's a great motivational song.
I like that song too. It's really upbeat and catchy.
Me too. It's one of my go-to songs when I'm feeling down.
What do you do for a living?
That's cool. I'm a web designer
